Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- Extreme Class allies' ATK & DEF 40%{passiveImg:up_g}, plus an additional 
ATK & DEF 20%{passiveImg:up_g} for characters who also belong to the 
"Demonic Power" Category
- Receives an additional Ki +1 per Ki Sphere obtained
*When attacking*
- ATK & DEF 100%{passiveImg:up_g}
*6 or more Ki Spheres obtained*
- ATK & DEF 100%{passiveImg:up_g} for 3 turns
*Per "Demonic Power" Category ally or Extreme Class ally on 
the team (depending on which has more members)*
- ATK & DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g} when attacking (up to 150%)
*When all allies attacking in the same turn are "Demonic Power" 
Category characters, or when all allies are Extreme Class 
characters*
- Guards all attacks
- Changes Ki Spheres: INT to AGL
- Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (INT & AGL 
excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres
*As the 2nd or 3rd attacker in a turn*
- High chance of evading enemy's attack

7110.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK for 1 turn and 
causes colossal damage to enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

7111.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn and 
causes mega-colossal damage to enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

23.Name: Destruction Brought by the Demon King Himself
23.Description:
Raises ATK by 100% temporarily 
per charge count and 
causes ultimate damage to enemy
